20:37 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> has joined #xwiki  
20:38 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> Hi! I'm just looking at XWiki for the first time and am a little confused. What language is it coded in? What languages would I be coding in to extend it? Thanks in advance  
20:54 <tmortagne> xwikiorg\_guest\_6: XWiki is a Java application so most of of its backend is in Java  
20:54 <tmortagne> then we use Velocity a lot for templating  
20:54 <tmortagne> and of course a lot of JS and CSS for frontend  
20:54 <tmortagne> that's for standard XWiki  
20:55 <tmortagne> but then you can use any language supported but Java scripting API  in pages or templates (python, ruby, etc.)
